summary: The Super Bowl is the biggest game in American football, held every year in February. It's the final match of the NFL season, where the best teams from two conferences (AFC and NFC) compete. The winning team gets the Vince Lombardi Trophy. The game started in 1967 after the NFL and AFL merged. So far, 20 teams have won, with the Pittsburgh Steelers and New England Patriots having the most wins (6 each). The Super Bowl is super popular, with lots of people watching and companies spending lots of money on ads. It's like a national holiday, with big food parties!
title: Super Bowl
